original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens steady at 319.00/322.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened steady at 319.00/322.00 to the US dollar on Friday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 319.50/321.00 to the US dollar on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted unchanged from close on Wednesday at 13.10/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted at 13.35/45 percent down from closing at 13.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.35/45 percent stable from closing at 14.25/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.55/65 percent up from closing at 14.45/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 15.95/16.05 percent up from closing at 15.85/16.00 percent. (Colombo/Aug03/2023)
